title: If you thought Bard was the worse troll champion
body:
What happens when you give a champion the ability to re position any member of your team which has a lower cd than bard's ult?

Inb4 Tahm cockblocked my kill threads
Inb4 Tahm forced throw me into the enemy team threads
Inb4 Tahm ate a mumu/sejuani/blitz and then flashed into our team thread
